\begin{problem}
Is the operator $(P^L)$ upper-semi-continuous ? \sol{No, consider
a sequence $x_n=l_1 + \frac{l_2}{n}$. We have $P^L(x_n)=l_1$, thus
$\inf_n [P^L(x_n)]=l_1$. Now $\inf_n x_n = l_1$ thus $P^L[\inf_n
(x_n)]=0$.}
\end{problem}
